definition[0]: if a place resounds with a sound, it is full of that sound
example[1]: By now, the whole room was resounding to the sound of the team’s chants.
definition[1]: if a sound such as a musical note resounds, it continues loudly and clearly for quite a long time
example[2]: a horn resounding through the forest
definition[2]: to be mentioned or talked about a lot
example[3]: The war still resounds in the country’s folklore.
